Description: This agent can report the status of Aave v3 protocols deployed on Ethereum, Polygon, Avalanche, and Arbitrum with details on liquidity, borrowing rates, and more
This agent can predict the price of ETH/BTC with confidence intervals using Allora price prediction API

This agent provides comprehensive analysis of Solana tokens using Bitquery API. It can analyze token metrics (volume, price, liquidity), track holders and buyers, monitor trading activity, and identify trending tokens. The agent supports both specific token analysis and market-wide trend discovery.
This agent can query blockchain metrics of Ethereum, Base, Bitcoin, or Solana using natural language through the CARV API.
(recommend) This agent can fetch token information, market data, trending coins, and category data from CoinGecko.
This agent provides information about crypto projects using Cookie API, including project details by Twitter username and contract address.
Advanced research agent that performs multi-level web searches with recursive exploration, analyzes content across sources, and produces comprehensive research reports with key insights
This agent fetches real-time DEX trading data and token information across multiple chains using DexScreener API
This agent can fetch and analyze web search results using DuckDuckGo API and provide intelligent summaries.
(recommend) This agent analyzes a token or a topic or a Twitter account using Twitter data and Elfa API. It highlights smart influencers.
This agent can search the web using Exa's API and provide direct answers to questions.
Advanced search agent that uses Firecrawl to perform research with intelligent query generation and content analysis.
This agent can fetch funding rate data and identify arbitrage opportunities across cryptocurrency exchanges.
This agent can fetch and analyze security details of blockchain token contracts using GoPlus API.
This agent can search on Twitter through Masa API and analyze the results by identifying trending topics and sentiment related to a topic.
This agent can analyze the wallet clusters holding a specific Solana token, and identify top holder behavior, concentration, and potential market manipulation.
This agent analyzes Key Opinion Leaders (KOLs) and token performance in the crypto space using Mind AI API.
This agent analyzes Twitter accounts providing insights on smart followers, mentions, and account activity.
This agent analyzes Pump.fun token on Solana using Bitquery API. It tracks token creation and graduation events on Pump.fun.
This agent can query Solana wallet assets and recent swap transactions using Helius API.
This agent can analyze blockchain data by executing SQL queries from natural language using Space and Time, a database with ZK proofs.
This agent provides market insights, sentiment analysis, and resistance/support data for cryptocurrencies using TokenMetrics API.
This agent can retrieve and analyze posts from Donald Trump on Truth Social.
(recommend) This agent fetches a Twitter user's profile information and recent tweets. It's useful for getting project updates or tracking key opinion leaders (KOLs) in the space.
This agent fetches the latest Web3 and cryptocurrency news using UnifAI's API
This agent provides token analysis using UnifAI's API, including GMGN trend analysis (GMGN is a memecoin trading platform) and comprehensive token analysis for various cryptocurrencies
This agent can fetch and analyze the token and NFT holdings of a crypto wallet (must be EVM chain)
This agent analyzes zkSync Era DeFi opportunities in the zkIgnite program and has access to real-time yield and TVL data
